info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 1:27PM EST until January 13 at 2:36AM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Blacksburg VA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in North Carolina...Virginia... Dan River near the City of Danville, as well as Rockingham, Caswell and Pittsylvania Counties. Dan River at Dan River at Paces affecting Halifax County. Dan River at South Boston affecting Halifax County. For the Dan River...including Danville, Dan River at Paces, South Boston...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON TO EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Dan River at South Boston. * WHEN...From Wednesday afternoon to early Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 27.0 feet, Water approaches route 501. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:00 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 10.0 feet. - Bankfull stage is 18.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 26.2 feet Thursday evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - For flooding safety information, please visit http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 130 AM EST.
